Review Title: Don't Book Here During Hot Weather in London
Negative Reviews: So many things not to like about this hotel. For one, it was extremely overpriced. Second, the carpet in our room smelled really badly--maybe a cleaning solution? The bathroom had no towel racks or fan so if you showered during hot weather the room heated up really badly. It also advertises itself as a traditional Georgian building--great if you want all the worst features such as old carpet and tall windows that don't let in much air. It all felt like the owners just did  the bare minimum to keep the hotel running, but certainly nothing to warrant the high prices. Mostly I was disappointed with the staff. They were not very friendly when we checked in. We were there during a heat wave and when I mentioned that our fan didn't work properly, the staff person said they didn't have any more and that they were fully booked. It was night so I asked if they could get another one the following day and the staff person said no.
